text: Meanwhile, on the Radiant Feldspar...

speaker: Thomas
line: Welcome, Director Topaz! The Family ambassadors are still inside making preparations, but the Big Boss hasn't arrived yet. It'll be a while before the conference starts, I'm afraid.

speaker: Topaz
line: Huh, quite a spectacle. The Family really knows how to make things look impressive.

speaker: Topaz
line: I thought they would choose a more formal and low-key location for the conference. I didn't expect them to go with a luxury airship...

speaker: Thomas
line: About this, Director... I've asked around. This airship, named the Radiant Feldspar, belongs to the Alfalfa Family .

speaker: Thomas
line: This conference between the IPC and The Family will have a direct impact on Penacony's future. Such an important event should have been held at... at... well... somewhere secretive in the Moment of Morning Dew .

speaker: Thomas
line: The atmosphere here... Tsk, it doesn't feel serious enough.

speaker: Topaz
line: Hmm...

speaker: Topaz
line: If I'm right, this conference is probably just a prelude. Whoever organized it wants to assess the IPC's stance beforehand.

speaker: Topaz
line: This influential figure either has their own ambitions and wants to reach a preliminary agreement, or they plan to put pressure on us to make us back off.

speaker: Thomas
line: Ohh! Your mind is always so sharp, Director Topaz! When the Big Boss arrives, please remind her to be cautious and watch out for any traps...

speaker: Topaz
line: Hahaha, thank you for the reminder, but I don't think that will be necessary. When she's at the table, it's the others who need to be cautious.

speaker: Topaz
line: Just tell everyone on our team to stay focused on their tasks and not worry about the negotiations.

speaker: Thomas
line: Oh... got it. I'll do it right away.

speaker: Topaz
line: Oh, and one more thing.

speaker: Topaz
line: Don't call Miss Jade "Big Boss" in front of her, or there will be serious consequences. I mean, really serious.

speaker: Thomas
line: G-got it! Thank you for the reminder, Director!

text: Take the elevator to the lower level

title: Mission Description
content: For Topaz, the Penacony project was over before it even started. The struggle forWatchmaker's Legacy,Aventurine's memorable demise,Sunday's ambition to become a god... She had brushed up against all of these major events.But now, she had to step forth and complete negotiations with The Family's rep. Topaz had no complaints about this... First of all, she is a professional, and second of all, she loves the feeling of shooting that game-winner.

text: Kill time while waiting for the meeting with The Family's rep to begin (0/3)
(After taking the elevator)

speaker: Topaz
line: None of the important figures have arrived yet... Looks like the conference won't be starting for a while.

speaker: Topaz
line: Such a bustling place. I think I'll take a little walk around.

text: (Investigate the buffet table)

speaker: Numby
line: Oink... Oink, oink! Oink!

speaker: Topaz
line: Are you hungry, Numby?

speaker: Topaz
line: Food in the dream... shouldn't taste bad, right?

text: Toss a Potato Fries Sundae to Numby.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Numby, catch!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: ...Oink! Oink, oink!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: *hiccup*

children.text: Numby gulps down the Potato Fries Sundae, then lets out a satisfied puff.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Looks delicious, huh? I should have taken a bite first.

text: Toss an Oak Cake Roll to Numby.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Numby, catch!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: ...Oink! Oink, oink!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: Oink... Oink...

children.text: After eating the Oak Cake Rolls, Numby seems a bit uncomfortable.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Oops, not to your liking huh... Sorry, I'll treat you to a nice meal once we get back to reality.

text: Toss a Floatdisc Burger to Numby.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Numby, catch!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: ...Oink! Oink, oink!

children.speaker: Numby
children.line: Oink! Oink, oink!

children.text: Numby lets out an earnest cry, as if a Floatdisc Burger can't satisfy its appetite.

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: There, there. Don't be so greedy. Leave some for the other guests!

text: (Talk to The Family's Guard)

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: So many buttons... How many centuries would it take to press them all?

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: Didn't expect those pooches to actually recycle them all...

speaker: Numby
line: Oink? Oink...

speaker: Topaz
line: Huh? What are these?

text: (The Family's Guard stands up and his voice changes)

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: A-ahem! For your safety, please stay away from those objects.

speaker: Topaz
line: For my safety? Are these buttons something dangerous?

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: Not exactly... Lately, there's been a prankster in the sweet dream who's been handing out strange button devices to anyone he meets.

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: According to those involved, he said something like, "Just press this button, and all of Penacony will explode!"

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: Luckily, no one believed him. Still, the Bloodhound Family collected these buttons just to be on the safe side.

text: Haven't the hounds caught the culprit yet?

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: Where's that prankster? Haven't the hounds caught him yet?

children.speaker: The Family's Guard
children.line: Hah! That guy has some skills, I have to admit that.

children.speaker: The Family's Guard
children.line: However, you know... the Bloodhound Family won't give up. Whoever disrupts order in the Dreamscape will face severe consequences!

text: Hasn't anyone actually tried pressing it?

children.speaker: Topaz
children.line: What will happen if you press it? Hasn't anyone actually tried?

children.speaker: The Family's Guard
children.line: Well... perhaps you don't know much about Penacony? All the guests here have one thing in common: They're terrified of death.

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: Anyway, The Family will deal with these things. Please kindly keep your distance.

text: (Talk to The Family's Guard again, optional)

speaker: The Family's Guard
line: For your safety, please stay away from these buttons!

text: (Talk to The Family's Attendant)

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: Greetings, madam. What can I do for you?

speaker: Topaz
line: Hello. Could you tell me more about the Radiant Feldspar?

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: I assume you are the ambassador of the IPC Strategic Investment Department ? It's my honor to assist you.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: The Radiant Feldspar is owned by Mr. Oti Alfalfa , head of the Alfalfa Family. Mr. Alfalfa invested a significant amount in building this luxurious airship an Amber Era ago, and it has been sailing across the Twelve Hours of the Dreamscape ever since.

speaker: Topaz
line: Oh, so it's owned by Old Oti himself! No wonder this ship is so lavishly decorated.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: Indeed, Mr. Alfalfa has impeccable taste. Only the most prestigious guests are invited by the Alfalfa Family to board this airship.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: Please allow me to continue with my introduction. The Radiant Feldspar had been cruising over the Sea of Dreams in Penacony for an entire Amber Era, but its voyage was temporarily halted due to the recent reverberation...

speaker: Topaz
line: Reverberation? Such a formal way of putting it. You're really downplaying the whole thing.

speaker: Topaz
line: Ah... I apologize. Please, continue.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: ...Ahem. Following the previous reverberation in the sweet dream, the Radiant Feldspar had to suspend its voyage temporarily.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: Thankfully, the factors that disrupted the Dreamscape have been resolved. However, due to... well... certain special reasons, the Charmony Festival , originally scheduled at the Penacony Grand Theater , had to be temporarily postponed.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: So Mr. Alfalfa suggested relocating the Charmony Festival to the Radiant Feldspar, taking this opportunity to announce the resumption of the airship's voyage.

speaker: Topaz
line: Well, that would meet The Family's needs and also create momentum for Mr. Alfalfa himself. Quite fitting for a legendary tycoon like him.

speaker: Topaz
line: Thank you for explaining matters to me. Goodbye~

text: (Talk to The Family's Attendant again, optional)

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: I wish you a great time aboard the Radiant Feldspar.

text: (After investigating all marked locations)

speaker: Numby
line: Oink... oink?

text: (Topaz picks up a call on her earpiece)

speaker: Topaz
line: Hello?

speaker: Topaz
line: ...The Talent Motivation Department again? Internal review? Will it ever end?

speaker: Topaz
line: I'm working on a major project, I don't have time to squabble with you guys.

speaker: Topaz
line: The way I handled the Jarilo case was approved by senior management, and all of the project logs and call records are complete. Can't you check them yourselves?

speaker: Topaz
line: I just don't understand... Why are you so fixated on this minor case and constantly escalating it? Seriously, what's your purpose?

speaker: Jade
line: Sounds exhausting... Why not just hang up?

text: (Cutsceneplays)

children.speaker: Jade
children.line: In my opinion, you handled that project quite well.

children.speaker: Jade
children.line: A little ball of ice in exchange for the Astral Express' good favor â€” that's not a bad deal for the Department.

children.speaker: Jade
children.line: It's been a while, little Jelena.

children.speaker: Jade
children.line: I've been looking forward to working with you. Never imagined this day would come so soon.

children.speaker: Jade
children.line: You can tell me anything, just like old times.

text: (Cutscene ends)

speaker: Topaz
line: It's been a while, Madam Jade. I'm honored to have the opportunity to work with you.

speaker: Jade
line: You're still so formal, aren't you? Forget about the hierarchy and treat me as your equal. No need for unnecessary titles like "madam".

speaker: Topaz
line: I'm sorry, but it might take some time to get used to that. After all... you are a senior.

speaker: Jade
line: Well, now that we're both members of the Ten Stonehearts , I need you to be at your best, especially since the upcoming negotiations leave no room for error.

speaker: Jade
line: As sharp as you are, I'm sure you've figured out the true purpose of this conference, right?

speaker: Topaz
line: I believe Old Oti has taken it upon himself to test our limits before the official negotiations between the IPC and Penacony.

speaker: Jade
line: That's true, and it works in our favor. Do you know why?

speaker: Topaz
line: If we can reach some sort of agreement with Old Oti beforehand and gauge our opponent's boundaries, our future negotiations will go much more smoothly. That's the obvious benefit.

speaker: Jade
line: Exactly, and the hidden benefit is that... as the head of the Alfalfa Family, his actions suggest that the Five Lineages might not be as united as the Odes of Harmony would suggest.

speaker: Jade
line: As long as the influence of Harmony hasn't completely permeated their core, personal desires will always have their way. Thankfully, influential figures in Penacony haven't entirely suppressed their own desires.

speaker: Jade
line: It's similar to the power struggles within the IPC. The supposed "all for one" philosophy shared by the Five Lineages... it's just a slogan now that the Dreammaster has gone.

speaker: Topaz
line: After the downfall of the Oak Family , Old Oti's faction became the dominant force in Penacony. Even if we consider only the succession order, he's the longest-serving and most senior among all the Family heads.

speaker: Jade
line: Yes, that's exactly why we need to handle the conference following an agreed-upon strategy. It's like playing a game of chess, where every move needs to be carefully thought out.

speaker: Topaz
line: Absolutely. The three steps of negotiation: Listen, test, and strike. That's what you taught me.

speaker: Jade
line: Pretty clear, although you seem to have changed the order in the Jarilo case.

speaker: Topaz
line: That was based on my personal experience.

speaker: The Family's Attendant
line: I apologize for interrupting your conversation, but the family head is ready to meet the ambassadors from the Strategic Investment Department.

speaker: Jade
line: Time to get to work. Let's prepare ourselves and meet that esteemed "supporting actor."

speaker: Jade
line: Remember, our goal is to create an opportunity for the IPC to enter Penacony. Aventurine has already made a small opening, and you and I... we're going to tear it wide open.

text: Go with Jade and meet with The Family's rep

title: Step Description
content: Madam Jade, who had been hiding in the shadows this whole time, finally appears. She and Topaz will attend the meeting with The Family.The Family rep is Oti Alfalfa of the Alfalfas, a seasoned, eagle-eyed Pepeshi merchant. Smart as two of the Ten Stonehearts, not even they are able to predict the direction this meeting will take...

text: (Approach the marked location)

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohohoho! Welcome aboard my ship, the Radiant Feldspar, smart and charming ladies!

speaker: Old Oti
line: Please, have a seat! Let's have a pleasant conversation!

text: Sit down and begin talks
(Approach the marked location)

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho! Welcome aboard, my dear ladies! Forgive me for any lack of attentiveness that might have led to a lengthy wait outside.

speaker: Jade
line: No problem at all, Mr. Alfalfa. It's my honor to meet you in person. You may not be aware, but the book Oti Alfalfa: The Biography is a must-read for all Strategic Investment Department employees.

speaker: Topaz
line: After all, to many, you are the legendary figure who single-handedly built the Penacony economy.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho! I expected no less from the Ten Stonehearts from the Strategic Investment Department! You're definitely skilled in the art of conversation.

speaker: Old Oti
line: I always enjoy talking to smart people because we don't have to beat around the bush, we can just get straight to the point instead. Since I invited you IPC ambassadors on board, I'm sure you've figured out the topic I'd like to discuss, yes?

speaker: Jade
line: The future of Penacony, if I'm not mistaken.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho! Precisely! Those few words represent a terribly complicated situation indeed!

speaker: Old Oti
line: Let's take that golden-haired guy who's not showing up for example. He put in great effort and almost got himself killed, but what was it all for?

speaker: Old Oti
line: Wasn't it eventually to create an opportunity for you IPC to regain control of the precious Asdana ? Ohohoho...

speaker: Jade
line: The wisdom and experience you've accumulated over ten Amber Eras are truly impressive.

speaker: Jade
line: Let's assume your assumptions are correct, Mr. Alfalfa. How would you respond to the IPC's actions?

speaker: Old Oti
line: I appreciate your composure, Miss Jade! You must have witnessed much in your worldly experiences.

speaker: Old Oti
line: However, perhaps you don't know much about Penacony... Ohohoho... Old Oti won't sit idly by when faced with a greedy wolf.

speaker: Jade
line: Please go ahead... I'm all ears.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho... then I'll be straightforward. I requested this meeting before the official conference to dissuade the Strategic Investment Department from trying to lay a finger on Penacony.

speaker: Old Oti
line: If you back off now, you can make a smooth exit... and prevent the IPC from losing face during more important negotiations.

speaker: Topaz
line: One of our P45 executives was attacked and nearly killed in the Dreamscape. The IPC can't simply ignore this incident. Moreover, considering the turbulence during the Charmony Festival... Penacony's credibility has taken a hit in the public's eyes.

speaker: Topaz
line: Despite your determined attitude, the issues plaguing Penacony are real, are they not?

speaker: Old Oti
line: You used the term "real," Miss Topaz, but let's not forget that this is the realm of dreams! If you want to succeed here, you need ambition and unconventional thinking!

speaker: Old Oti
line: Curious about how I plan to respond to the IPC? Well, I don't mind sharing. My actions will help Penacony take a significant step forward by "self-listing" and going public!

speaker: Topaz
line: ...Going public?

speaker: Jade
line: If I'm not mistaken... you want to bypass the IPC and go public on a universal scale?

speaker: Old Oti
line: Precisely! Instead of watching the IPC gnaw away at Penacony, I'd prefer to open the doors of the sweet dream to the entire universe.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Starting today, anyone in the Cosmos can become a shareholder of the Land of the Dreams! This is the path of Harmony I'll choose! Ohohohoho!

speaker: Old Oti
line: This reform should have been implemented earlier, but unfortunately, the Oak Family were a bunch of blockheads blinded by " Order ..." Their level of intellectual flexibility doesn't even come close to an old fellow like me.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Thanks to the little "reverberation" earlier, the biggest obstacle between me and my reforms has been eliminated! Ohohohoho!

speaker: Old Oti
line: The Alfalfa Family will publicize the financial results of Sweetdream Paradise, so that the entire universe can see that despite the catastrophe, Penacony still holds immense potential and opportunities, and that The Family remains confident in its future.

speaker: Jade
line: Crisis and opportunity are two sides of the same coin. So, you've been waiting for the right moment for Penacony to regain the spotlight.

speaker: Jade
line: And if Penacony should seize this opportunity to overcome adversity... Even if the IPC tries to intervene, every move we make will be scrutinized by trillions of people.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho... now I'm convinced that you've indeed familiarized yourself with my biography, Miss Jade. So, about your next move... please consider it carefully.

speaker: Jade
line: Indeed, we need some time to digest such a wealth of information.

speaker: Jade
line: I suggest we conclude the first half of our conference, Mr. Alfalfa. Please allow Topaz and me to confer privately for a few moments and to respond on behalf of the IPC later.

speaker: Old Oti
line: Ohohoho, of course. Take your time, dear ladies.

text: When you have a chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret.
